title: Can we have a gamemode where junglers don't gank please ?
body:
????

It's bad enough engaging on a ranged champion is hard as fuck, I have to worry about Lee Sin being there while my jungler is jerking off.

Seriously laning skills would significantly improve if we can fucking focus on laning instead of being paranoid of ganks 24/7.

Yes I just lost as Mundo mid and I'm salty as fuck.
